description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in LiquidPoll LiquidPoll – Advanced Polls for Creators and Brands.This issue affects LiquidPoll – Advanced Polls for Creators and Brands: from n/a through 3.3.77.

product.name: LiquidPoll – Advanced Polls for Creators and Brands
